function.name: generate_neologism_image
function.description: Generate a visual card for a neologism using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. Creates expressionist painterly images in two styles: dictionary cards (cat's-eye urban scenes with neo-noir lighting) or locale cards (fantasy landscapes with mythical inhabitants). Automatically called after presenting a neologism to the user.

neologism_type.description: Type of visual card to generate: 'dictionary' for urban expressionist portraits with definitions, 'locale' for fantasy landscape places with mythical inhabitants

word_or_place.description: The neologism word (for dictionary type) or place name (for locale type)

pronunciation.description: Pronunciation guide for the neologism (e.g., '/day-pay-zee-mahn/' or '/ek-lip-ser-ah/')

definition.description: Complete definition of the neologism - what the word or place means and embodies

emotional_keywords.description: 3-5 comma-separated mood descriptors that capture the emotional essence (e.g., 'melancholy, nostalgic, bittersweet' or 'displacement, wonder, disorientation')

etymology.description: Linguistic roots and origin of the neologism, citing foreign language sources (e.g., 'From French dépayser (dé- remove from + pays country)' or 'From Old Norse eclipsa (eclipse) + Latin era (epoch)')

additional_context.description: Optional. For locale type: terrain features, weather, mythical creature inhabitants, and rituals they conduct. For dictionary type: additional scene details.

reference_image_path.description: Optional. Path to user-uploaded reference image for color palette and mood inspiration (multimodal input)
